RALPH_VALIDATION.feedback:
Implementation is substantially complete and all 493 tests pass with zero failures. The code is well-structured and production-quality. However:

1. PHASE 11 POLISH TASKS NOT DONE: Tasks T125-T132 (lint cleanup, help text parity diff, state file parity, prompt text parity, exit code parity, cross-compilation verification, goreleaser check) have no evidence of execution. These are verification tasks that require running specific commands and recording results.

2. T081 HELP TEXT PARITY: Task requires 'compare character-for-character against shell version's help text'. The test only checks that flags exist in the template — it does NOT compare against the shell version output.

3. T126 HELP TEXT PARITY (Phase 11): Same issue — requires diffing ralph-loop --help against ralph-loop.sh --help.

4. TASKS.MD NOT UPDATED: All 132 tasks are still marked [ ] unchecked. The implementer should mark completed tasks as [x].

To complete: Run golangci-lint and fix issues (T125). Diff help text against shell version (T081/T126). Verify state file parity (T127). Diff prompt templates against shell prompts (T128). Verify exit code parity (T129). Cross-compile for 3 platforms (T131). Run goreleaser check (T132). Mark completed tasks as [x] in tasks.md.
